name: Famaliar Spirit
description:
My Intro to Games Development Final Project

Famaliar Spirit is a horror puzzle game in which you play a lost ghost boy. “Famaliar” stands for “Father mother liar”. Help the ghost navigate through the strange mansion and solve puzzles in order to find out who you are and what happened to you (indeed, you were dead and turned into a ghost). 

Play Instructions: 

  1. Wear a headphone for the best experience.
  2. Use the WASD keys to move
  3. Interact with objects using the spacebar.
  4.  When you interact with an object and it gives you options, use the arrow keys to move between options and the Spacebar or Enter key to select an option.

Programming & Development: Me

Scripts & Visual Arts: Kenneth Castro

Visual Arts & Design: Sam Tian, May Chen
